Title: Enacts the "New York beverage modernization act"; repealer
Summary: Enacts the "New York beverage modernization act"; authorizes the sale of alcoholic beverages on Sundays and Christmas day; makes related changes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to enacting the "New York beverage modernization act"; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
